title: Bug 123044 - Page break not observed in the first item when previewing attached PDF file
description: Description: When previewing the attached file in PDF, the expected page break in the first item didn't occur. Steps to reproduce: 1.
OB: When previewing the attached file in PDF, the expected page break in the first item didn't occur.
EB: Preview the file in PDF. Expected result: The first page should be blank because the first item is set to pagebreakbefore always. Actual result: The page break before action didn't happen.
SR: 1. Open the attached file in the PDF previewer.
